name: Liminal 24-Hour
description:
Liminal 24-Hour is a short visual novel about two strangers having a late-night conversation in a roadside diner.

The game's scrip totals just over six thousand words, and it takes roughly 20 minutes to complete. It features branching dialogue options, numerous sprites, and two fully illustrated CGs.

Content Warnings:

Liminal 24-Hour contains strong language and discussions of death.
